code: import'./Header.css';import headerLogo from'../../images/logo.png';import headerAvatar from'../../images/avatar.jpg';import{makeApiRequest}from'../../utils/utils';import React from'react';import{currentDate}from'../../utils/constants';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(){const[cityName,setCityName]=React.useState('');function handleAddClothesButton(){document.querySelector('.modal_type_garment').classList.add('modal_opened');}React.useEffect(()=>{makeApiRequest().then(data=>{setCityName(data.name);}).catch(err=>console.log(err));});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__left-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:headerLogo,className:"header__logo"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"header__date-location",children:[currentDate,", ",cityName]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__right-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"header__add-clothes-button",onClick:handleAddClothesButton,children:"+ Add clothes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header__profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"header__username",children:"Reynaldo Perez Pauli"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:headerAvatar,className:"header__avatar"})]})]})]});}export default Header;
